message: When the other students see how you killed Golin, a panic breaks out. Screaming, they all run out of the building.
When the little students see how you killed their teacher, a panic breaks out. Screaming, they all run out of the building. Just Golin remains.
No. That won't go. You can't get late to school and then sit in the last bench.
Look who we got there? A new kid? However, you are late for class. Sit down now, and be punctual next time.
No walking around in my lessons! Please sit down.
No talking, please.
In the beginning there was...
Then ...
After that ...
What...? Don't interrupt me. Now I don't know where I was. I have to start from the beginning.
Eventually ...
Psst...
Be quiet, please. How can I concentrate if you are talking all the time? Where was I? I better start anew.
We all see...
After all...
At last...
OK now. Does anybody has a question?
Oh dear. Didn't you listen? Well, because you are new, I will tell you again.
And now we get to a completely different thing. Let's have some practice with fighting.

replies.text: Finally. I thought her talking would never cease.

message: Everybody get your practicing gear of the chest over there. Each of you take one wooden sword and one paper shield, please. Then sit down again.

replies.text: May I use my own weapons?

message: Of course. You mustn't hurt yourself.
Of course not.
Where is your weapon and shield?

replies.text: I still have to get it.

message: Hurry now.
You all have your gear? OK.
Listen everybody: Use the sword and shield of the school set. We duel in pairs, the new kid first.
Run now, seek ye an opponent!
Just go ahead. But don't forget: You must use the school weapon and shield.
Hello, big one.
As you approach the little student, horror spreads on his face.

replies.text: Don't panic. I'll go away again.

message: He jumped up and ran screaming out of the room. The other little students followed in panic.
You sit next to a smug looking child at about your age.
Hi kid. I am Golin.
No talking, please.
Very well, you have found a place after all. Now let us proceed with our history lesson.
No talking, please.
I will start from the beginning again, because it is so important. You can't listen to it often enough.
Who on earth puts such an ugly, hideous thing into a school?

replies.text: Hey, I saw that! Your eyes have sparkled!

message: The statue showed no signs of movement.

replies.text: I will keep an eye on you!
[Poke your finger in the belly of the statue]

message: Leave me alone! What do you want of me?
Of course I can talk. Why should I not? I am at school after all.

replies.text: I have no time for you now. I have to find a partner for dueling. Bye
What can you tell me about this school?

message: I like it here. It is warm and the students love me. I am their mascot.
I learn much about The Shadow, all very exciting.
But you heard the teacher: You must go now and fight your duel.

replies.text: Which dueling partner would you recommend?.

message: Take this cheeky boys in the front row. The others would be no match for you.

replies.text: Why not an easy prey? I will take one of the little ones.
Maybe I should try the teacher?

message: Me?? NO!! That'd be unfair!! I have done no harm! You're nasty! [The statue began to weep]

replies.text: OK, OK, I was only joking.
Mh, yes. Let's try, how long you might defend yourself.
I'll take Golin. Shadow be with you!

message: Do not scare me like that again!/n* sob *

replies.text: You are much too sensitive. That was just fun.
Maybe I should go and try the teacher?

message: YOU! I HAVE ENOUGH NOW!
Suddenly the small ugly figure begins to rize! Greater and greater, until it seems to almost fill the whole room.
YOU FILTHY WORM! KNEEL IN THE DUST BEFORE YOUR MASTER!

replies.text: Now that's a worthy dueling partner at last!
Eh, it was nice to have met you. I have to leave now... Bye.

message: Keep your hands off this box until I allow it.
Brimhaven School
You noticed our beautiful mascot? I just love it.
Now hurry, take a seat!
I won't have you running around during my history lesson! Back to your seat!
Back to your seat, until I explained the rules!
Do you have a question?

replies.text: I'd like to duel with you.

message: What an interesting idea! No one ever asked me. Well, I shouldn't do it, I might hurt you. But it is tempting.

But of course you have to use the school weapon set first.
Come back when you are properly equipped.
Let's see what you are able to!
What have you done! You killed Golin! Murdered him!
You killed Golin! You actually killed him! I don't believe it!
I still can't believe it. Leave the school - now!
Very, very good!
You treated Golin in a great way, I couldn't have done it better!
As a reward, you can get an ice cream from the baker. Tell him I sent you.
I can't teach you things that are new for you. Leave now, you don't need to come to school anymore.
I saw, that you cheated!
You didn't use the harmless school gear. Golin could have get injured!
I can not accept such a behaviour! You have to leave our school - now!
Enough - stop now! I have seen enough. You have an interesting fighting style.
I don't think that I could teach you anything new.
Very, very good!
I couldn't have done it better!
As a reward, you can get some ice cream from the baker. Tell him I sent you.
where... where am I? And you, kid? I have never seen you before. What are you doing in my class?

replies.text: Good morning! Do not worry about me, I'm gone immediately.
I just destroyed the evil statue in the corner.

message: The statue is gone? What a relief! I never had a good feeling about it.

replies.text: Yes, it seems that it has enchanted you all.

message: brv_teacher_150_20 tbc...
Thank you again for saving me and my class. You are ever welcome here!
I remember to have banned you from school! What are you doing here?
Ah, my best student! Welcome back to my school.
Murderer! Out of my eyes!
Was about time. This is my favourite class.
Listen, she is going to explain.
You want to fight me?! Hahaha!
Hahaha! Hahaha! Sorry  * snort * Pooh! You are really funny!
[still giggling] If you insist - en Garde!
Hey, you are not bad! We should stop here indeed. Otherwise you might get hurt.
Haha! Yes, me of course. Do not always be offended.
Practice session is over now. We won't duel anymore.
Wow, what is that for a beast? What did you do?

replies.nextPhraseID: I don't know either, but it looks like it wants to kill me.

message: Wow, what was that for a beast? You were splendid!
Now that the statue is gone, I feel like a great burden has fallen from my soul.
